activities: CfMC conducts marketing research and opinion polling services on behalf of its clients through the use of web surveys. Data collected via these surveys include opinions and demographic information. We also sometimes are provided the email address from our clients in order to invite individuals to participate in our web surveys.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: demographic information (age, gender, ethnicity, etc), customer name and email address
